Before joining Sorbonne Université and LPSM I have been

* (assistant-)professor at [Agroparistech](www.agroparistech.fr),

* then researcher at the [INRAE](www.inrae.fr) (French National Research Institute for Agriculture, Food and the Environment), 

while remaining affiliated to the 

* joint research unit (UMR) Mathématiques et Informatique Appliquées [(MIA) Paris-Saclay](mia-ps.inrae.fr).
